channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: OECD Framework for the Classification of AI systems
item.description: OECD Framework for the Classification of AI systems by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Tuesday 22 February 2022 at 7:00.
